title: Robot Monster Vocalizations Vol. 2
description: Robot Monster Vocalizations sound package with 172 high-quality monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/robot-monster-vocalizations-vol-2-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7b5boa84c8gky5d/MSE%20-%20Robot%20Monster%20Vocalizations%20vol.2.pdf?dl=0


The collection contains 15 voice actions, including 172 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 20 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 16 deaths
  • 20 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 8 snarls
  • 12 victory shouts
  • 8 effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 4 idle voice sounds
  • 8 sounds when jumping
  • 4 laughing sounds
  • 4 sounds of upset
  • 16 grunting sounds


The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


Vocalizations are perfect for voicing both robot characters and enemy characters and bosses. All voice samples are made in a dark style.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 172 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 15 voice actions
  • 88 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 40 voice samples of the pain type
  • 44 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 172

Number of Audio Cues: 172

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 3 minutes 33 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
